title.narrative: F.a: Mother tongue education for Akha-children

description.narrative: WHAT: Work to enhance language and literature by increasing awareness of the officials concerning children?s right for mother tongue, educating the teachers, building preschools, developing the Loma-Rshi writing system as well as producing a curriculum and teaching material. WHY: In the Phongsal county possibilities for the children of ethnic minorities to have culturally relevant education in their mother tongue are vague. The project aims to develop preschooling responding to the children?s needs, which s erves as a model for developing local curriculums in other counties. RESULTS: The ethnic minorities engage in educating their children, three culturally and linguistically relevant preschools are being developed as pilot projects and Laotian education offi cials learn the practices of participative teaching. BENEFICIARIES: The children of ethnic minorities in the Phongsal county in Laos. PARTNER: World Renew Laos
